Sentry Pauldrons here too, waiting for Guardian Pauldrons to drop.

Arud Bastad
46 Bard on Bristlebane
-----Original Message-----
From:
sentto-160851-24877-991063221-matosvr=theriver.com@...

om]On Behalf Of Bill Costlow

To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] shoulders...



For me:
Sentry Pauldrons +12 AC +2 Strength +2 Agility +2 Dexterity +3 Magic
Resist +5 Mana
Not sure what a songshawl is, but it sounds way cool
"Cyr, Thierry" <thierry.cyr@...> wrote: Just curious, i became the
happy owner of a songshawl last night, and was
wondering what other high level bards are using as a shoulderpiece...
could
i be looking for a better shoulderpiece out there?

Minkin
Ayonae Ro
